NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Social Media and Critique or the cell corresponding to Travel and Critique?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Travel} and {Critique} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Art and Critique or the cell corresponding to Social Media and Preservation?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Social Media} and {Preservation} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Cuisine and Globalization or the cell corresponding to Cuisine and Influence?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Cuisine} and {Influence} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Travel and Accessibility or the cell corresponding to Cuisine and Preservation?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Travel} and {Accessibility} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.05 to 0.09?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Social Media, Critique), (Art, Globalization), (Gaming, Influence), (Travel, Influence)}.
